summary: Once upon a time a god gave a mighty sword to the king of Aquiles to bring justice to his people. Now he wants it back - but the king rather gives his life than the sword. Goddess Dehamira,... See full summary Â»
cast: Eric Allan Kramer|Margaret Lenzey|Donald O'Brien|Dina Morrone|Chris Murphy|Laura Gemser|Marisa Mell|Don Semeraro
title: Ator y la espada de Graal
